name: FlipAnim Project
summary: A FLIPANIM file contains a project created by Poklik FlipAnim, an online program used to create flipbook animations. It stores one or more drawings that make up a flipbook animation along with settings for the animation, such as page speed, page transparency, and the zoom. FLIPANIM files replaced .FLP files, but are saved in the same format.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
